SEARCH

Class ScreenOverlay

java.lang.Object
ScreenOverlay
public class ScreenOverlay extends Object
Represents the UI elements of the gameplay screens besides the pet.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ScreenOverlay

      public ScreenOverlay(ScreenManager screenManager, Pet pet)
      Constructs a screen overlay.

      This class holds all UI elements of the gameplay screens besides the pet. This includes buttons and stat bars.

      Parameters:
      screenManager - the screen manager to handle transitions.
      pet - the pet object.
